Room.Name: Plasnelt Road/Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Plasnelt Road and Wall Road West.
Room.LongDescription: Plasnelt Road goes all the way across the village in an east-west direction. Wall Road West parallels the western village wall. This is the better part of the village, and a number of old mansions are on the east side of the road. Lately, a few shops have been established to service the homes.
